text:
A couple, Venkatesan (50) and his wife Maheswari (45) of Aarasur village in Vandavasi taluk drenched themselves with kerosene in the collectorate gate as the weekly grievance redressal meet was to begin in the collectorate on Monday.

They demanded the authorities to interfere in a civil dispute.

Policemen on duty detained the couple. - Staff Reporter
title: Immolation bid
